parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper motor can cause the wipers to stop working, leading to poor visibility, especially during heavy rainstorms or other adverse weather conditions, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: and may not work at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion of brake lines can cause brake fluid leaks, leading to a loss of brake pressure, which can increase the stopping distance and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: brake pedal travels to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: vehicle pulls to one side during braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driver's seat track can cause the seat to become loose or detach from its anchor, potentially leading to loss of control, accidents, or injuries, especially during sudden stops or collisions.
symptoms: The driver's seat feels loose or unstable
the seat becomes detached from its anchor
the seat track bolt shears off.
